sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; import './Tablet.css'; const Tablet = () => { const [language, setLanguage] = useState('en'); const [showQR, setShowQR] = useState(false); const content = { en: { welcome: "Welcome to AGB/Bienvenue chez AGB", frenar: "FRENAR", selectService: "Please select your service/Veuillez choisir votre service", cashOps: "Cash Operations", verserRetirer: "Verser/Retirer", paperTicket: "Paper Ticket", ticketPalier: "TicketPalier", virtualTicket: "Virtual Ticket/", customerService: "Customer Service", ticketVirtuel: "TicketVirtuel", conseillerClient: "Conseiller Client", scanCode: "Scan this code to access", corporateVip: "Corporate/VIP", cardsDigital: "Cards & Digital", qonnexea: "QONNEXEA", trackTurn: "anl atatck your turn", enterprises: "Entreprises", cardsEBanking: "Cartes & E-Banking", cancel: "Cancel/Return", showQR: "Show QR Code", hideQR: "Hide QR Code" }, fr: { welcome: "Bienvenue chez AGB/Welcome to AGB", frenar: "FRENAR", selectService: "Veuillez choisir votre service/Please select your service", cashOps: "Cash Operations", verserRetirer: "Verser/Retirer", paperTicket: "Paper Ticket", ticketPalier: "TicketPalier", virtualTicket: "Virtual Ticket/", customerService: "Customer Service", ticketVirtuel: "TicketVirtuel", conseillerClient: "Conseiller Client", scanCode: "Scan this code to access", corporateVip: "Corporate/VIP", cardsDigital: "Cards & Digital", qonnexea: "QONNEXEA", trackTurn: "anl atatck your turn", enterprises: "Entreprises", cardsEBanking: "Cartes & E-Banking", cancel: "Cancel/Return", showQR: "Show QR Code", hideQR: "Hide QR Code" } }; const t = content[language]; // Fonctions pour les services (à connecter plus tard) const handleServiceClick = (service) => { console.log(`Service sélectionné: ${service}`); // Ici vous ajouterez la navigation }; return (
{/* Header */}

AGB

{t.welcome}

{t.frenar}
{/* Main Content */}
{/* Left Side - Service Selection */}

{t.selectService}

{/* Cash Operations */} {/* Paper Ticket */} {/* Virtual Ticket / Customer Service */} {/* Ticket Virtuel / Conseiller Client */} {/* Corporate / VIP */} {/* QONNEXEA */} {/* Enterprises / Cartes & E-Banking - Centered */}
{/* Right Side - QR Code */}

{t.scanCode}

{/* QR Code Button */} {/* QR Code Display */} {showQR && (
{t.qonnexea} {t.trackTurn}
)}
); }; export default Tablet;
